channel.title: War Bush Security on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in War Bush Security on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: for the years of terror we have invoked on them
item.description: This is a rant: I do not like that we are at war right now. I think it is really ridiculous. I mean, our enemy is a group of militants that we don?t officially know exists, they use weapons that are more powerful than what we use, they are scare mongered into inhuman monsters. And it seems that bush has yet to acknowledge that there is a problem in the middle east(in terms of U.
